page.title: 02BIOGRAPHY
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICHOLAS.MORNING On Sunday I got up at 6:50am I watched Rub A Dub Tub on TV at 7:00am.After that I watched Are You Awake Yet? At 8.30am I got dressed put on my clothes which were a pair of swankers,a tee shirt,white socks,my white shoes and a blue coat with a couple of red stripes.I had three Weetabix and milk and went to the papershop for the Sunday papers.I went to call for my friend but he wasn't up so I went to my aunty's house.At 11.00 I went to call for David again and we decided to go to the swimming baths.We walked 1km stopping at a shop to buy some crisps.At the swimming baths I paid 15p to get in,changed into my swimming costume,put my clothes in a basket and handed them to the attendant who stored them.
